messageBody:
popcorn_099 wrote:

> I need help with doing a particular thing in JUnit. Any help would be
> highly appreciated.

If I understand you correctly, you want to build a test suite from
individual tests, rather than from other test suites.

Yes, you can do this:

suite = new TestSuite();
suite.add(new Module1TestCase("testAPI2"));
suite.add(new Module2TestCase("testAPI1"));
...

It would be relatively easy to specify this as a text file, then build
the test suite from the text file, if you needed such a feature.

PS: If your TestCase class doesn't have a constructor taking a test
name, then you can add one like this:

MyTestCase(String name) { super(name); }

This is the legacy constructor that was eliminated in JUnit 3.7, but is
still occasionally useful, such as in your situation.

Good luck.
